doc.after: Information science in studying the collection classification manipulation storage retrieval and dissemination of information has origins in the common stock of human knowledge Information analysis has been carried out by scholars at least as early as the time of the Abyssinian Empire with the emergence of cultural depositories what is today known as libraries and archives 9 Institutionally information science emerged in the 19th century along with many other social science disciplines As a science however it finds its institutional roots in the history of science beginning with publication of the first issues of Philosophical Transactions generally considered the first scientific journal in 1665 by the Royal Society London
